9d9bd273-6c51-4142-91f3-e520bede8483: Each creature you conjure with any summon {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} gains a +4 enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} for the duration of the spell that summoned it.
cc25f63e-83e1-4ce7-81a3-6b92d9b5196e: Each time you cast a summoning {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} that conjures more than one creature, add one to the total number of creatures summoned.
